author: gsim
msg: QPID-4675: Allow receivers from direct exchanges without a subject filter. Merged from r1462139.

author: gmazza
msg: Added YUICompressor Maven plugin to compress CSS and JS files, webdocs/scripts and /templates now copied into Mavenized WAR file.

author: gsim
msg: QPID-4674: Detect asynchronous connection close, session end and link detach. Merged from r1462138.

author: robbie
msg: QPID-4594, QPID-4682: changes from review of new 'management mode' functionality
- Tweak the command line options for the management mode ports to group the options and make it clear they are only for management mode, and remove a nam
- Make the virtualhosts load during management mode, enabling them to normally be managed as well.
- Add a new command line option to quiesce the virtualhosts during mangement mode if required.
